---
title: "Donor Lexemes"
---

On this page you can browse the donor lexemes attested in the database so far. You can find more information in the original file. The column "Translation" provides the translation presented in the source. English and Russian dictionary translations are added for comparison.

<br>

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(DT)

concepts <-  read_tsv("D:/GitHub/DAG-APT/data/dagapt_donor_lexems.tsv")

datatable(data = concepts[, c(2,3,4,5,6,14, 12)],
          filter = 'top',
          colnames = c("Lexeme", "Transliteration", "English_translation", "Russian_translation", "POS", "Language", "Comment"),
          extensions = 'Buttons', 
            options = list(dom = 'fBltp',
                           buttons = list(list(extend = 'collection',
                                       buttons = c('csv', 'excel'),
                                       text = 'Download'))
                           ))

```
